nodes.text: Cody was a human male soldier for the Alliance to Restore the Republic. During the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance and the Galactic Empire, he fought Imperial troops on the moon Jedha.
Cody was a human male who joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic sometime during or before the year 0 BBY.
Cody was a human with brown eyes and tan skin.
Cody wore the fatigues of a Rebel trooper.

Cody was created as a playable character for the online browser video game Star Wars: Boots on the Ground. Players could select Cody to be a member of their three-man rebel squad. The image used for the character in Boots on the Ground is also an image of Stordan Tonc from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
